entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
